metadata.title: Songs of Scotland
metadata.description: Scottish folk songs from Haydn's *Volksliedbearbeitungen*, digitized by Damien Sagrillo.

songs.title: I Love My Love in Secret
Fy Gar Rub Her O'er Wi' Strae
This Is no Mine Ain House
By the Stream So Cool and Clear
Fy, Let Us A' to the Bridal
The Bonniest Lass in A'The World
Five and A'the Lands about it
I'm O'er Young to Marry yet
How Can I Be Sad on my Wedding Day
Ye Gods! Was Strephon's Picture Blest
Here's a Health to my True Love
